title: SITMOD Gaming Chairs for Adults with Footrest-Computer Ergonomic Video Game Chair-Backrest and Seat Height Adjustable Swivel Task Chair with Lumbar Support(Gray)-Fabric
descriptions:
Level up your comfort and performance with the SITMOD Gaming Chair for Adults with Footrest in sleek Gray fabric. Engineered for marathon gaming sessions and productive workdays, this high-back ergonomic chair blends plush comfort with pro-grade support, so you can focus longer and feel better.

Why you’ll love it:
- Ergonomic, all-day comfort: A high-back design with a soft, high-density thickened sponge seat cushion cradles your body. Adjustable lumbar support and an adjustable headrest help you maintain a healthy posture.
- Recline, relax, recharge: Tilt from 90° to 150° and kick out the retractable footrest to watch, rest, or strategize between matches.
- Built for movement: Smooth 360° swivel and upholstered, comfy armrests keep you agile and supported through every task.
- Durable by design: A solid thick steel frame, heavy-duty nylon base, and SGS-certified 4-level cylinder support up to 300 lbs with reliable stability.
- Tailored fit: Seat height adjusts up to 3.2 inches to match your desk setup. Generous dimensions—22-inch-wide, 32.6-inch-high back and a roomy 20.5 x 20.8-inch seat—fit most adults comfortably.
- Premium materials: Breathable fabric with carbon-fiber accents looks sharp and stays comfortable through long sessions.
- Versatile style: Minimal gray color complements gaming setups and modern offices alike.

Peace of mind included:
- No-questions-asked return policy and responsive support.
- Free parts replacement available if needed.

From clutch wins to deadline sprints, the SITMOD Gaming Chair delivers support, style, and stamina. Sit better. Play longer. Get more done.
